com.qoppa.pdf

Interface LocalFont


  • public interface LocalFont
    This interface represents a font that can be used by the library to embed into a PDF document.
    Author:
    Qoppa Software

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String fontFilePath() 
      java.lang.String getFamilyName()
      Returns the font family name.
      java.lang.String getFilePath()
      Returns the file path to this font.
      java.lang.String getFullName()
      Returns the full font name.
      java.lang.String getPSName()
      Returns the Postscript name for this font.
      boolean isBold()
      Returns flag indicating if this font is bold.
      boolean isEmbeddable()
      Indicates whether we are able to embed the font in a PDF document.
      boolean isItalic()
      Returns flag indicating if this font is italic.
      boolean isSubsettable()
      Indicates whether the font's usage rights forbid subsetting.
      boolean isSymbol()
      Returns flag indicating if this font is a symbol font.

    • Method Detail

      • getFilePath

        java.lang.String getFilePath()
        Returns the file path to this font.
        Returns:
        The file path to the font file.

      • getFullName

        java.lang.String getFullName()
        Returns the full font name.
        Returns:
        The name of the font.

      • getFamilyName

        java.lang.String getFamilyName()
        Returns the font family name.
        Returns:
        The font family name.

      • getPSName

        java.lang.String getPSName()
        Returns the Postscript name for this font.
        Returns:
        The Postscript name.

      • isItalic

        boolean isItalic()
        Returns flag indicating if this font is italic.
        Returns:
        true if this font is italic.

      • isBold

        boolean isBold()
        Returns flag indicating if this font is bold.
        Returns:
        true if the font is bold.

      • isSymbol

        boolean isSymbol()
        Returns flag indicating if this font is a symbol font.
        Returns:
        true if the font is a symbol font.

      • isEmbeddable

        boolean isEmbeddable()
        Indicates whether we are able to embed the font in a PDF document.
        Returns:
        true if and only if the font's usage rights do not restrict embedding and we are technologically capable embedding the font in a PDF document.

      • isSubsettable

        boolean isSubsettable()
        Indicates whether the font's usage rights forbid subsetting. If a font is embeddable but not subsettable the entire font file must be embedded even if only a small number of glyphs are used.
        Returns:
        true if the font's usage rights do not prohibit subsetting.

      • fontFilePath

        java.lang.String fontFilePath()
        Returns:
        The path to the file this font was loaded from.
